text: the bible says that god never tempts or
tests anyone with evil sin or sickness
or suffering so we got to stop saying
that god is in control every time a bad
thing happens as if he orchestrated it
for our benefit god is our helper not
our troublemaker the devil is the
god teaches us with his word rather than
with tragedies so don't blame god when
things go wrong but realize only good
things come from god beginning with
jesus christ i'm pastor chad stevenson
come learn the bible at houston faith
